resources.string: Grant the following permissions to continue the program:\n\n%1$s
Please give us permission in the settings:\n\n%1$s
The user comes back from the settings page.
Your phone is not allowed us to draw on other applications.
Your phone is not allowed us to install apps.
Please check the external storage device.
当前应用缺少必要权限。\n\n请点击\"设置\"-\"权限\"-打开所需权限。
